Container.Name: unifi-network-application
Container.Overview: The Unifi-network-application(https://ui.com/) software is a powerful, enterprise wireless software engine ideal for high-density client deployments requiring low latency and high uptime performance.
Container.Changes:
### 2024-03-04 - Install from zip package instead of deb.
### 2023-10-17 - Add environment variables for TLS and authSource to support Atlas and new MongoDB versions.
### 2023-09-05 - Initial release.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: Unifi web admin port

Config.Name: Port: 3478
Config.Description: Unifi STUN port

Config.Name: Port: 10001
Config.Description: Required for AP discovery

Config.Name: Port: 8080
Config.Description: Required for device communication

Config.Name: Port: 1900
Config.Description: Required for `Make controller discoverable on L2 network` option

Config.Name: Port: 8843
Config.Description: Unifi guest portal HTTPS redirect port

Config.Name: Port: 8880
Config.Description: Unifi guest portal HTTP redirect port

Config.Name: Port: 6789
Config.Description: For mobile throughput test

Config.Name: Port: 5514
Config.Description: Remote syslog port

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: All Unifi data stored here

Config.Name: MONGO_USER
Config.Description: Mongodb Username. Only evaluated on first run. **Special characters must be url encoded(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percent-encoding)**.

Config.Name: MONGO_PASS
Config.Description: Mongodb Password. Only evaluated on first run. **Special characters must be url encoded(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percent-encoding)**.

Config.Name: MONGO_HOST
Config.Description: Mongodb Hostname. Only evaluated on first run.

Config.Name: MONGO_PORT
Config.Description: Mongodb Port. Only evaluated on first run.

Config.Name: MONGO_DBNAME
Config.Description: Mongodb Database Name (stats DB is automatically suffixed with `_stat`). Only evaluated on first run.

Config.Name: MEM_LIMIT
Config.Description: Optionally change the Java memory limit (in Megabytes). Set to `default` to reset to default

Config.Name: MEM_STARTUP
Config.Description: Optionally change the Java initial/minimum memory (in Megabytes). Set to `default` to reset to default

Config.Name: MONGO_TLS
Config.Description: Mongodb enable TLS(https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/connection-string/#mongodb-urioption-urioption.tls). Only evaluated on first run.

Config.Name: MONGO_AUTHSOURCE
Config.Description: Mongodb authSource(https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/connection-string/#mongodb-urioption-urioption.authSource). For Atlas set to `admin`.Defaults to `MONGO_DBNAME`.Only evaluated on first run.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: Container Variable: PUID

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Container Variable: PGID

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: Container Variable: UMASK
